captions.text: We're finally back with a special single album [Boys' Record]
Before we start, we have a relay question to answer

- Before we wrap up, we have to ask 
- It's 4MINUTE
a relay question for the next artist
We better make it good, they danced so passionately
Okay then, let's begin VIXX's ASK IN A BOX!
What is the concept behind your special single album [Boys' Record]?
I think I'll take this one
It's about youth and its precious memories
The song is about making good memories
I think KEN was the best at expressing the 'youth'
Make sure you add in some sound effects like...
Have you said goodbye on a sunny day?
It's worse than on a rainy day
You can't hide the smallest facial expression
The next question is from Ji Seon Kyung
You're back with a brighter song
Show us how you feel to be 'bright'

- What is that?
- What's he doing?
That's a lot coming from him, a double peace sign?
Who can show them using their bodies?
I think you're the only one...
Whose legs are on the track list?
Oh, the picture we revealed with the track list
With a cute pair of socks and white sneakers
You know so well, are they your legs?
So we picked HYUK who was born in 1995
Your new album is a remake album
What kind of songs did you listen to when you were young?
I guess we can sing our favorite songs from the past?
I thank you so much, oh baby
I won a competition with that song
The prize was money, which I gave to my mom
And she gave me kisses in return
I was a big fan of Fly to the Sky when I was in middle school
'Condition of My Heart' was one of my favorite songs
How I cried the night you left me
A Round of 'I Love You' Game

- HYUK
- You've got the wrong person
You have to pay the price, you laughed!
We're going to see some critical 'aegyo' today
No way, you have to do it right
You have to act way cuter
I want to hear the members laugh
Whoa, he sounds like a king
That's so not going to air...
Which member can make LEO laugh?

- You're welcome
- Your name was the loudest
It's alright RAVI, take it easy
One of the ways to make LEO laugh is...
I'm going to move to LEO's box for a sec...
RAVI trying to make LEO laugh...
Yeah, it will crack him up for sure
His hair is hilarious... underneath that hat

- Are you serious?
- For the viewers!
It's nothing... I just wanted my hat to fit nicely so...
I heard RAVI showers for 7 seconds, is this true?
There's no need to explain this

- Yes, there is
- You can't explain this
I think you'll do great in the military
Sometimes I go to grab him a towel
But that doesn't mean I'm dirty, because...
I can wash quickly, you know?

- Swish swish 
- You don't even rub

- No, I take longer than...
- Swish swish
It takes me longer than 7 seconds
The point is, RAVI is a clean guy
Why does VIXX slice each other's necks?
It's our way of showing affection
We don't really mind who we slice
LEO, how much coffee do you drink a week?
I drink up to 12 cups at most...
I think you should cut down a little
Do you drink with a straw?
Why did you start drinking coffee?
What kind of cafes do you go to!
Will we be able to hear a new original song at the Utopia concert?
LEO and I performed an original at our first concert
You can find the answer to that at the concert
I assure you can look forward to it though
LEO, that's one of your favorite songs too, right?
I think you should sing it for her then!
I think the melody and the words of the song...
and the arrangement fit me well
Here's a little bit of it...
I want to be with you
what other people think, this moment
How did you get so tall?
I wonder! How did we get so tall!

- What on Earth!
- Can we watch again?
Can we watch again? So cute!
How did you get so tall?
I don't know! How did we?
I drank a lot of milk when I was young
I'm the opposite, I hated milk
So what should we tell the little guy?
Should he drink milk or not?
I think he shouldn't care so much about his height...
He should just exercise a lot

- Yeah
- Drink a lot of milk
Just grow up eating healthy things
Then someday, you'll be tall like us!

- From a baby, to a baby
- Go kiddo!
Now it's time for us to ask a relay question
We have an official question though
We're curious about how people see us
Please support VIXX back with a special single album, [Boys' Record]
and please listen to 'Love Equation' as well
This is VIXX on ASK IN A BOX

comments.text:
You have to say "I love you" to the person on your left or right and they 
either have the choice to reject it but it they accept they say it to the 
person next to them. You try and make it as funny as possible, either the 
way you say it or the way you reject. The person who laughs loses. It 
usually goes until there's only one person but this one was a one loser 
game.

Could be baiting as well. Similar to the carrot on a stick. They dangle it 
in front of you and then they yank it away because they don't want you to 
have it just yet, but they want you to be hungry for it. lol Fishing is 
similar to allure the fish. They throw the line out and reel it in, 
catching the attention of the fish. In other words, they want you to be 
interested, but they can't give you all the info just yet. So they're 
tempting you with a tidbit.
